page.title: 13ADULT TRAINING CENTRE
page.content:
Next door to our school is the Monk Bretton centre for the{mentally {handicapped.}It is called an{Adult {Training Centre}rather than a school for the mentally handicapped; they attend more or less all the year round and work on{various activities}such as pottery, weaving,{woodwork and {painting.
They have recently acquired a{plot {of land}at the side of the school and with the help of the Parks Department have begun to{cultivate}the land and have even built a{greenhouse.
At{Christmas}they create a{Santa's {Grotto}which is absolutely fantastic. All the children from our school are invited to go round to see their work.
